articles.source: ABC News - Breaking News, Latest News and Videos
articles.summary: Texas flooding updates: Abbott says 850 rescued as 27 still missing Children were among the dozens who were killed, officials said. Officials give new details on deadly flash floods in Texas, search for survivorsOfficials in Texas provided updates on the “catastrophic” flooding and desperate search for survivors, warning community members to not conduct their own searches due to hazardous conditions.
